welcome.title: Welcome to Let me Out VPN!
welcome.description: Here you can purchase access to secure and fast VPN via Outline.
welcome.action_text: To get started, click "Buy a key"

apps.title: Download Outline Client
apps.description: Select the app for your operating system:
apps.action_text: After installation, add your access key to the application.

help.title: Bot Help
steps: Use the key in Outline app

payment.after_payment: After payment you will instantly receive a VPN key for connection.
